title: TCT Clip: Rahima Mahmut on our complicity in Uighur cultural genocide, and what we can do about it.
description:
I ask Uighur interpreter and activist if The US and Europe are directly benefitting from the cultural genocide of her people, and what we can do about it.

Full conversation:
https://youtu.be/s7RfBqmCOX8

https://twitter.com/MahmutRahima
